Source.Name: seatd
Source.Summary: A minimal seat management daemon, and a universal seat management library
Source.Description: A minimal seat management daemon, and a universal seat management library. Seat management takes care of mediating access to shared devices (graphics, input), without requiring the applications needing access to be root.
